activities:
Categories of EEA Data: We sell web-based business application software services to businesses of all sizes. We receive business-related information from the EEA, including contact information of individual representatives of the businesses with whom we are dealing, including, without limitation, names, addresses, work phone numbers, work email addresses, titles, etc. of EEA Persons ("EEA Data"). 

Lead Liaison maintains a privacy policy for information it collects in connection with its business activities. In other areas, such as the provision for our customers using our hosted online services platform, software consulting, support, and services, Lead Liaison acts as a data processor. When conducting those activities, Lead Liaison holds and/or processes data at the direction of its customer, which acts as a data controller and is responsible for providing notices to data subjects. Lead Liaison does not control this data and any access to or use of such data is incidental to completing its contractual requirements for the customer. 

Lead Liaison maintains a privacy policy in connection with its provision of services to its customers. We collect and use EEA Data for purposes of providing products and services to our customers, communicating with corporate business partners about business matters and opportunities, processing EEA Data on behalf of corporate customers, providing information on our services, and conducting related tasks for legitimate business purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online data collected through Lead Liaison’s website, mobile application, navigational information, including personal and demographic information; includes manually processed data.
recoursemech:
EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) 
Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
